official_title: To designate the Federal building located at 600 Princess Anne Street in Fredericksburg, Virginia, as the "Samuel E. Perry Postal Building".

summary.text: Designates the Main Post Office located at 600 Princess Anne Street, Fredericksburg, Virginia, as the Samuel E. Perry Postal Building.
